#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>

int factorial_mod4(const int &n);

int main()
{
	char s[4];
	int sum;

	const int ones[10][4] = {	{0, 0, 0, 0}, 
								{1, 1, 1, 1}, 
								{2, 4, 8, 6}, 
								{3, 9, 7, 1}, 
								{4, 6, 4, 6}, 
								{5, 5, 5, 5}, 
								{6, 6, 6, 6}, 
								{7, 9, 3, 1}, 
								{8, 4, 2, 6}, 
								{9, 1, 9, 1}	};

	while (scanf("%s", s) && strcmp(s, "#"))
	{
		sum = 0;

		for (int i = 1; i <= atoi(s); i++)
		{
			int index;

			if (factorial_mod4(i) == 0)
			{
				index = 3;
			}
			else
			{
				index = factorial_mod4(i) - 1;
			}

			sum = (sum + ones[i % 10][index]) % 10;
		}

		printf("%d\n", sum);
	}
}

int factorial_mod4(const int &n)
{
	int result = 1;

	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
	{
		result = (result * i) % 4;
	}

	return result;
}
